programme.title: Tariq El Ward
programme.desc: The series revolves around a young village woman who is fond of roses. When she faces a major problem that puts her in the center of family conflicts, she is forced to flee her village for the city in search of a better future, but her journey will be full of problems and difficulties.

programme.title: Bghit Hyatek
programme.desc: Three families have their lives turned upside down when they allow strangers to enter their world and destroy it.

programme.title: L'Maktoub
programme.desc: As a family seeks to keep its inheritance, its members decide to marry off Omar Al-Maatawi to his brother's wife after his death in order to achieve that end, but Omar's heart is attached to the girl Hind, who looks very similar to his deceased wife.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Kadin
programme.desc: Bahar meets Sarp on a ship , they fall in love and get married. Bahar gives birth to a girl named Nisan and a young boy, Doruk, but her life turns upside down when her husband disappears from their lives and she's forced to face life with her two children alone.

programme.title: El Fed TV 3
programme.desc: The sitcom presents a number of satirical segments that address, through various figures in Moroccan society, many social issues, in an attempt to present them in an interesting comedic way.

programme.title: Jib Darkoum
programme.desc: It follows the dentist Mohsen, who falls in love with a girl from a rich family, and since he is an orphan, he lies to her and introduces her to a fake family who proposes to her family. Hilarity ensues when he is forced to live with the lie during the dating period that will last a month under one roof.

programme.title: 2 Wjouh
programme.desc: The series takes place in the city of Casablanca and tells the story of one of the slums in which begging and poverty are widespread, through stories from the class that suffers in Moroccan society.

programme.title: ‏Bnat Lahdid‏
programme.desc: Fatima is a young woman from a poor environment, who is distinguished by her strength and determination in overcoming life's difficulties. She works in her father's profession of selling used car supplies, until she meets a rich man and tries to get closer to him and his family. However, Fatima gets into serious problems and conflicts afterwards.

programme.desc: A mix of entertaining and educational programmes for children.

programme.title: Story Of The Prophets
programme.desc: Animated cartoon based on the Prophets of Islam.

programme.title: Ramadan and Fasting
programme.desc: Diving into the physical and spiritual benefits of fasting this Ramadan.

programme.title: Drama: Omar
programme.desc: Hit drama based on the historical facts of the life of Omar Ibn Al-Khattab (may Allah be pleased with him), exploring the complexities of his Caliphate until his death.

programme.title: Ramadan Journeys
programme.desc: Join Sheikh Jassim Al- Ainati, from Kuwait on a spiritual journey this Ramadan as he reflects over important lessons to revitalise your emaan during this blessed month.

programme.title: Places In the Quran
programme.desc: A guide of the places mentioned in the Holy Qur'an and their importance. The flood of Noah, the water of Madeen, the people of the cave, the Kaaba, Al-Aqsa in Palestine, Babylon, Saba and others.

programme.title: Once Upon Every Ramadan
programme.desc: Join us as we learn more about the religious aspects, rituals, customs, and traditions that surround the sacred month of Ramadan. Shedding light on how the holy month is celebrated across the world.

programme.title: Live Prayers from Makkah: Dhuhr
programme.desc: Join Islam Channel as we broadcast live Dhuhr prayers from Masjid al-Haram Makkah.

programme.title: Page by Page
programme.desc: A series providing an overview of the noble Quran page by page with Shaykh Dr. Ahsan Hanif, extracting the main themes from the words of Allah swt.

programme.title: Divine Knowledge of Islam
programme.desc: A program that helps guide us to the path of knowledge to help foster and develop the necessary relationships between individuals, their society, and their creator.

programme.title: Cooking Outdoors
programme.desc: On a quiet stove fire, we delight you with innovative dish of traditional and modern dishes, both Arab and Western, with the flavor of international cuisines.

programme.title: The Final Legacy
programme.desc: Documentary series about the life of the prophet Muhammad (SAW) from the inception of his prophethood, covering his noble champions and the spread of Islam through the world.

programme.desc: A daily surgery presented by Muslim scholars who answer viewers' questions.

programme.desc: Call to prayer, timed according to the London Central Mosque and the Islamic Cultural Centre.

programme.title: IslamiQA Live
programme.desc: A daily surgery presented by Muslim scholars who answer viewers' questions.

programme.title: Dada and Me: Backbiting Song
programme.desc: This song teaches us the dangers of speaking badly about anybody behind their backs. It encourages us to strive to be a better person by holding one's tongue, instead of engaging in gossip & slander.

programme.title: Live Prayers from Makkah: Asr
programme.desc: Join Islam Channel as we broadcast live Asr prayers from Masjid al-Haram Makkah.

programme.title: Come Iftar With Me
programme.desc: With delicious recipes, heart-warming stories, and a celebration of cultural diversity, this show is a must-watch for anyone interested in learning more about Ramadan cuisine and the Muslim community

programme.title: Melodies Of The Quran
programme.desc: Join Quran reciters from across the Muslim world to hear the different melodious styles in which the glorious Quran can be recited.

programme.title: Why Me? Birth
programme.desc: Ep3. Birth is one of Allahs greatest signs and miracles for us, and it encompasses so many blessings for you and your family. What exactly is the rizq associated with birth?

programme.title: 5 Pillars Pop Quiz
programme.desc: Increase your knowledge of Islam while having loads of fun with your family and friends. Join in this daily quiz and conquer all pillars through five levels of difficulty. Play along at home.

programme.desc: Join our daily Quran show during the blessed month of ramadan. Designed to help you recite the Quran in accordance with the rules of Tajweed and Makharij.

programme.title: National Qira'ah Competition
programme.desc: Competition to find the best UK reciter. Each day of ramadan there can only be 1 winner. 1 minute to recite a portion of Quran, impress the judges and go through the rounds to reach the grand final.

programme.desc: Join Islam Channel as we broadcast live Maghrib prayers from Masjid al-Haram Makkah.

programme.title: Great Judges
programme.desc: Biography of nine judges who had strong imprints on Islamic history during the Abbasid rule. Showing Muslim models in the Islamic ideology & discusses contemporary issues that threaten society.

programme.title: Why Me?

programme.title: Al Washm
programme.desc: The series takes place in an old Levantine neighborhood, where it showcases the intertwined human relationships of the neighborhood’s residents, and the overt and hidden conflicts that take place between them.

programme.title: Aghmed Aynayk
programme.desc: Zaid is a special needs child. Doctors diagnose his condition with being on the autism spectrum, so Mu’nis, his mother’s friend, takes care of him as he is affected by his psychological state, and tries to provide him with a stable and normal life.

programme.title: Al Sadeeqat
programme.desc: A businesswoman seeks to exploit some girls to achieve her personal interests by having them work as dancers and forcing them to do whatever she asks, whatever it is, and the stories of these women come across each other.

programme.title: Bayt Ahly
programme.desc: The events take place in the 1940s, after Nouri leaves prison, a major conflict arises between him and Abu Adnan, coinciding with the assassination of the doctor, Abdul Rahman Al Shahbandar.

programme.title: Mal El Qabban
programme.desc: The events of the series take place inside Al-Hal Market in Damascus, highlighting the conditions of the Syrians, through the story of the Noman Al Zeer family and the events and problems they are exposed to.

programme.title: Al Arabji 2
programme.desc: Events escalate in the second season of the series, and Abdou the coachman seeks revenge and retaliation against his enemies, especially Al Nashwati, who allied this time with Doria. On the other hand, Zumuruda, who fleed from cruelty and oppression, does not know which path her fate will take her.

programme.title: Kasr Adm 2: Al Saradib

programme.title: Arees Taht Al Talab
programme.desc: The events revolve around a group of people searching for love and marriage, and going through different circumstances. Dana creates an association for dating and reconciliation of loved ones, and the events continue.

programme.title: Al Khataya
programme.desc: Through six groups of five episodes, the work tells six stories about people who make mistakes and continue to make mistakes, but they lead them towards the abyss, and they drag other people with them.

programme.desc: Events escalate in the second season of the series, and Abdou the coachman seeks revenge and retaliation against his enemies, especially Al Nashwati, who allied this time with Doria. programme.title: Khoyout Al Ma'azeeb
programme.desc: Farhan is forced by life to work for a cruel man, Abu Issa. Farhan finds himself obligated to do everything Abu Issa orders until he has the opportunity to confront his oppression and injustice, leave everything, and run far away.

programme.desc: A bloody conflict arises between two brothers due to greed and jealousy, and revenge fills their hearts, causing the destruction of the entire family and putting one of them in prison.

programme.desc: Rasheed, his wife, Haila, and their three daughters live an ideal life, running a co-ed school. However, with the passage of time, secrets about Rasheed are revealed that no one expected.

programme.desc: Abu Samel returns with his wife Umm Samel again, and many situations and paradoxes occur between them, where Umm Samel tries to be in control and forcefully impose her opinion.

programme.desc: In this season, the three brothers, Khaled, Nasser, and Walid, join forces, after one of them is falsely accused of committing a crime. However, they decide to travel far away to hide in a safe city, unaware that the real criminal has been arrested.

programme.desc: Inside the halls of a residential building, the residents of the building meet, and friendly relationships, marriages, and divorces arise between them. On the other hand, family problems, murders, and thefts occur, so the residents seek to intensify their efforts to solve such things.

programme.title: Yassin Abdul Malik
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around Yassin Abdul Malik and his family, with whom he goes through various events, as many secrets about his hidden life are revealed.

programme.title: My Name is Melek
programme.desc: Gaziantep-born Melek is married and has three kids. Her life is turned upside down when her spouse leaves her alone and takes the kids with him.

programme.title: A'a Amal
programme.desc: The story revolves around Yassar, a ballerina, who goes through more than one failed love experience, but she continues to assume the image of a strong woman, and faces everyone with a smiling face.

programme.title: Forbidden Apple
programme.desc: The events highlight the world of businessmen and extreme wealth, the conflict created by love on the one hand, and the control of money over people on the other.

programme.title: Noqta Entaha
programme.desc: The neighborhood pharmacist, Fares Yacoub, who suffers from Parkinson's disease, struggles to hide his first crime, which he committed by mistake against his wife's teenage brother. On the other hand, his wife seeks to uncover the truth about the murder of her only brother.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Mae dau gyfaill wedi eu gwahanu gan y tir uchel rhwng eu cartrefi. Tybed all Tîmpo ddod a'r ddau at ei gilydd? Two friends are separated not by a short distance but by a long drop - oh no!

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae 'na ras fawr yn digwydd ar y traeth heddiw rhwng Sebra, Fflamingo a Mwnci ac mae pob un yn siwr y byddant yn ennill! It's race day and Zebra, Flamingo and Monkey each want to win!

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Ar fore gwlyb yn yr haf, mae tair malwen yn ceisio gwneud eu hunain yn gartrefol yn nhy Conyn. On a wet summer's morning, three snails try to make themselves at home at Conyn's.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu - i droi sbwriel yn sbeshal a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Dyffryn Trannon, Trefeglwys to create a superb treasure.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw bydd yr antur yn mynd â ni i wlad Sweden, i ddysgu mwy am dirwedd Sweden, bwyd traddodiadol fel peli cig ac ymweld â Stockholm, sef y brifddinas. We take a trip to Sweden today!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Ar ôl i'r Octofad fynd i drafferthion mae'r unig ffordd i gael y darn newydd sydd ei angen yw trwy ymweld â'r hen Octofad. On a visit to the old Octopad the Octonauts discover some visitors.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â Shani y poni ac Annie a'i chwn defaid. Today we meet Shani the pony and Annie and her sheep dogs.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae Al yn peintio'r ysgubor, mae'n rhaid i'w hanifeiliaid fynd ar wyliau dros nos. Ond mae 'na broblem. When Al needs to paint the barn the animals have to go on a sleepover!

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Thema'r rhaglen hon yw 'O Dan y Ddaear'. Today's theme is 'Under the Ground'.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Cen Twyn wrthi'n trwsio corn Twt ac yn addo y bydd yn swnllyd iawn. Cen Twyn is repairing Twt's funnel and has promised Twt that once repaired it will be louder than ever.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ifor Hael sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! The challenge is to collect as many clean teeth as possible and win the Dani Dant Trophy!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae nifer o drigolion glannau'r afon â'u llygaid ar ellyg aeddfed Crawc. Mae Gwich yn cynnig gwarchod y goeden gellyg... Ratty offers to guard Toad's pear tree - but it disappears!

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw.

programme.title: Mynyddoedd y Byd: Y Rockies
programme.desc: Y newyddiadurwraig Siân Lloyd sy'n cwrdd â phobl y Rockies ac yn gweld y byfflo gwyllt yn dod yn ôl i'r copaon. Journalist Siân Lloyd enjoys the spectacle of the wild bison in the Rockies.

programme.title: Mynyddoedd y Byd Y Rockies: Sian Lloyd
Y Fets
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae angen ychydig o waith deintydda ar Oreo y gwningen ac mae Hannah yn brwydro i achub Cymro y ci defaid. This time: what will the future hold for Mavis' Westie pups?

programme.title: Waliau'n Siarad
programme.desc: Aled Hughes a Sara Huws sy'n dadlennu stori hynod ffermdy Mynachlog Fawr yn Ystrad Fflur, Tregaron. We explore the remarkable story of Mynachlog Fawr farmhouse in Strata Florida, Tregaron.

programme.title: Waliau'n Siarad Ffermdy Mynachlog Fawr - Season 1, Episode 1
Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Prestatyn yw'n lleoliad wrth i Lowri Morgan ddathlu cyfraniad emynwyr gogledd ddwyrain Cymru i'n trysorfa o ganu mawl. We enjoy hymns from Rehoboth Chapel, Prestatyn, led by Trystan Lewis.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol Emynau Prestatyn - Season 2024, Episode 1
Cefn Gwlad: Stad Buccleuch
programme.desc: Hanes Siôn Williams, o'r Foel, sydd nawr yn Rheolwr Fferm ar stad enfawr Buccleuch, yr Alban. We meet Siôn Williams, from Dyffryn Banw, who's now a busy Farm Manager in the Scottish Borders.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad Sion Williams, Stad Buccleuch - Season 1, Episode 1
Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn ôl dros ddigwyddiadau'r wythnos yng Nghwmderi. Omnibus edition looking back at events in the fictional village of Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi: Glasgow v Caerdydd
programme.desc: Cyfle i weld y Glasgow Warriors v Rygbi Caerdydd ym Mhencampwriaeth Rygbi BKT Unedig, a chwaraewyd ddydd Gwener. A chance to see the Glasgow Warriors face Cardiff Rugby in the BKT URC.

programme.title: Sgorio: YSN v Airdrieonians
programme.desc: Pencampwyr Cymru, Y Seintiau Newydd, sy'n wynebu Airdrieonians yn Rownd Derfynol Cwpan Her yr Alban. The New Saints play Airdrieonians in the Scottish Challenge Cup Final. K/O 16.15.

programme.title: Barry John: Cofio'r Brenin
programme.desc: Rhaglen deyrnged i gofio am un o fawrion y byd rygbi yng Nghymru fu farw yn ddiweddar - Barry John. Tribute programme to remember one of the Welsh rugby greats - Barry John.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Ar Sul y Blodau bydd Nia Roberts yng Ngheredigion i gwrdd â Donald Morgan, arbenigwr ar flodau a'u harwyddocad yn nhymor y Pasg. We meet florist Donald Morgan and enjoy a feast of singing.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol Sul y Blodau - Season 2024, Episode 1
New: Am Dro
programme.desc: Heddiw, fe fydd Arfon, Morwenna, Osian a Beth yn mynd am dro i Landre, Cei Newydd i Gwmtydu, Llanrug, a Henllan. We take walks this week in Llandre, Newquay and Cwmtydu, Llanrug and Henllan.

programme.title: Nathan Brew: Un Eiliad Un Ergyd
programme.desc: Y cyn-chwaraewr rygbi, Nathan Brew, sy'n datgelu am y tro cynta hanes trawmatig lofruddiaeth ei frawd, Matthew, mewn ymosodiad un ergyd. We investigate the impact of fatal one punch attacks.

programme.title: Nathan Brew: Un Eiliad Un Ergyd
Gogglebocs Cymru
programme.desc: Mae Gogglebocs Cymru 'nôl. Ymunwch â Tudur Owen a'i ffrindiau - hen a newydd - i sbio ar deledu'r wythnos o Gymru a thu hwnt. Gogglebocs Cymru is back, with laughter, tears and arguments.

programme.title: Y Ditectif
programme.desc: Mae Mali Harries yn dysgu am uned arbennig Heddlu Gogledd Cymru sydd yn targedu troseddwyr rhyw. Mali Harries investigates how police in North Wales are targeting sexual predators online.
